text:
First talk by #keynote speaker @holly_cummins! The innovation fizzle, the fauxnovation, the maximal viable product. Holly's seen them all. So, in a world where there's always too much to do and little time, how can organizations make time to innovate? 

#vdathens2022 https://t.co/w0XAf5XXVs

author.description: Devoxx Greece 2023 (first edition) takes place for the very first time from May 4th until the 6th in the Athens Megaron International Conference Center.
author.name: Devoxx Greece
